# Welcome to the digital Eternal Ruins RPG character sheet and glossary
<sub> This website is a **fan-made** project created to help
players of the Eternal Ruins TTRPG. It is not affiliated with
Mythworks. </sub>

**README is a work in progress. Please refer to [the planning document](./docs/planning.md) for more details about the project.**

The Eternal Ruins RPG is a tabletop game made by Mythworks and the Artist Sam Car.
The Kickstarter will launch January 27th 2026 [here](https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/mythworks/eternal-ruins).


## Features

### Character Creation

Create a character sheet by selecting a source and version, then select {Path} and Origin, Wanderer experience. Then pick Edges, Skills, Oddements, Fragments and Aspects.

### Character Import/Export

Import and export character sheets as JSON files for easy sharing and backup. Import pregenerated characters from the beta.

### Character Management

View, edit, and manage multiple character sheets, add content from different sources. Create and add your own local Oddements Tags, Fragments and Aspects.

### Source Management

Import ported sources as JSON files, and view content
